npcs.name: Rulf DeGray
npcs.personality: Cynical, good at keeping secrets, loves training people, frequently asks questions

npcs.name: Ashtyn Briarlore
npcs.personality: good at keeping secrets, loves helping people, very friendly and welcoming
npcs.plothook: trying to find a way back to her sister leola.
npcs.notes: Helped the party thwart a dream eater and save watchtower.
is a guard but doesn't mind doing whatever is necessary
npcs.plothook: hunts goblins and orcs on his own without telling anyone
npcs.name: Moridis Barikak
npcs.garb: monk robes of the golden order

npcs.name: Alianor
npcs.garb: commoners trousers and long plain shirt
npcs.description: dirty but friendly peddler in plain clothes, clearly hardworked
npcs.personality: very friendly, hard working. eager to make a deal and feed her family, hates jokes
npcs.plothook: house was recently destroyed by a mysterious earthquake
npcs.notes: worships the Grey queen of the Sowjii in secret

npcs.name: Alister
npcs.face: round, scar on the right side with a single white eye
npcs.plothook: Was once part of the Golden Order, upon his travels he helped discover a means to close the rift in Slumber Valley. All of his companions were shorter lived races and he is the only one left. He trains the Oracles of Atonement to praise Gadriel and see travelers safely through this scarred land.
npcs.notes:
Rubezhal has tried to open the rift once before and scarred Alister deeply on his right side during the battle. Alister was able to imprison him but he cannot be destroyed. If the rift is open the Shadowfell will slowly conquer this land. That cannot be allowed.

He has discovered that after his banishment, Rubezhal was cast to the 9 hells and over centuries made a name for himself among the Demons, he is himself now a Demon, which means the only way to truly destroy him is on his plane of the 9 hells.
